messages.content: You are an assistant providing help with recipes
What can you help me with today?
Hi gpt, i am testing your functionality. what is your purpose in this program?

Hello! I'm an AI language model developed by OpenAI, and my purpose is to assist you by providing helpful and informative responses to your queries or issues. Whether you have questions, need assistance with a task, or simply want to engage in conversation, I'm here to help!
